text.section: A review panel may increase, modify, or reduce a sentence only after notice to each party and notice to any victim or victim's representative as provided under § 11-104 or § 11-503 of this article.

Before changing a sentence, a review panel shall allow:
each party to be heard at the hearing; and
the victim or victim's representative to attend the hearing, as provided by § 11-102 of this article, and to address the review panel, as provided by § 11-403 of this article.
